classData.comment:
/**
     * Analogous to the `HTMLElement` `closest` method. Searches starting at the passed element for
     * an element for which the passed `filterFn` returns `true`
     * @param {HTMLElement} el The element to start from.
     * @param {Function} filterFn A function which returns `true` when the desired element is reached.
     * @param {HTMLElement} [limit] The element to stop at. This is *not* considered for matching.
     * @returns {Boolean}
     */
classData.description: Analogous to the HTMLElement closest method. Searches starting at the passed element for an element for which the passed filterFn returns true

params.description: A function which returns true when the desired element is reached.
params.name: filterFn

params.description: The element to stop at. This is not considered for matching.
params.name: limit

classData.name: closest
